title: Azir E+Q Combo
body:
After patch 5.16, Azir's E into Q combo feels really clunky. Before the patch I could E and Q straight away, in one fluid motion. However, I keep finding myself standing still and just W'ing a soldier.
Has anyone else encountered this or is it just me?

replies.body: You can't E unless you're in range of a soldier now. Is that what you're talking about?

It seems to be alright for me, and i play him a lot, but i will keep an eye out for it from now on to see. 
i still find myself E-ing into katarina's ultimate tho, out of habit.
